headline: AutoZone Appoints New Board Member
summary: MEMPHIS, Tenn., April 23, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- AutoZone, Inc. (NYSE: AZO) today announced the appointment of Claire Rauh McDonough to the AutoZone Board of Directors. Claire serves as the Chief Financial Officer of Rivian, an American automotive manufacturer that develops and builds category-defining electric vehicles as well as software and services that address the entire lifecycle of the vehicle.
